  • Constructor Details

    • RecipeDetailController

      public RecipeDetailController()

  • Method Details

    • FavouriteMeal

      protected void FavouriteMeal()
      This method handles toggling the favorite status of the current recipe. If the current recipe is not set, it will display a message and return. If the current recipe is favorited, it will remove it from the favorites. If the current recipe is not favorited, it will save it to the favorites. It will update the heart image accordingly.

    • setRecipeData

      public void setRecipeData(com.example.granny_gains_new.model.Recipe recipe)
      Sets the recipe data to be displayed in the UI components.
      Parameters:
      recipe - The Recipe object containing the details to be shown.

    • loadImage

      protected javafx.scene.image.Image loadImage(String imagePath)
      Loads an image based on the provided image path. If the image is not found at the specified path, a default image will be returned.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - The path to the image to be loaded. Must start with a forward slash ("/").
      Returns:
      The loaded Image object. If the specified image is not found, a default image will be returned.

    • handleBackToMeals

      protected void handleBackToMeals() throws IOException
      This method handles the action for navigating back to the meals page. It retrieves the current window stage, loads the meals_page.fxml file, creates a new scene with the loaded content, and sets the scene to the stage for displaying.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the loading of the meals_page.fxml file
